name: Sparkling Orchid Layered Sparkle Combo {Inspired by the Color of the Year}
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Layered Sparkle™ line.***

*It is inspired by the Pantone Color of the Year, Radiant Orchid, but is not endorsed by Pantone.

Nothing is more customizable than the various pendants of the Layered Sparkle™ line. This pre-designed set is inspired by the fuchsia-infused orchid color for 2014. It features a Purple Rainbow Oval Pendant, a Cyclamen Opal Triple Drop Cluster, & a Mini Violet Opal Cluster.

This is the listing for ONE SET of (3) pendants & a stainless steel chain. For additional options or starter sets, see the "Interchangeable" section of the shop.

*Details: 
Longest Pendant Length: 1.25 inches 
Swarovski crystal pendants 
Silver-Filled jumprings, Stainless Steel Chain, & Fine Silver Wire

(This listing is for EVERYTHING SHOWN. Other chains & pendants are available. A "Customized" version of this necklace is also available. If you choose this option, you will receive an e-mail after ordering.)

*Chain Length Options: 
16 inches (hits at nape of neck) 
18 inches 
20 inches 
24 inches (hits at middle of chest) 
30 inches (hits below chest)

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Mystic Sparkle Earrings {Available in 5 Sparkly Colors}
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

When you want a pair of earrings that are both edgy and easy, then these are the ones for you! You'll be entranced by the sparkle coming from the mystical triangle Swarovski beads.

These earrings feature large triangle-shaped beads hanging off silver circles. They have fishhook earwires. *Please note: Definitely wear your included rubber earnuts to prevent the earrings from falling out when you are dancing the night away.***

*Details: 
1.75 inches long 
Swarovski crystal beads 
Sterling Silver earwires 
Silver-Filled jumprings

*Color Options: 
-Clear (Pic 2)-for the girl who wants to be understated 
-Clear AB/Rainbow (Pic 3)-for the girl who loves to shine
-Silver Night (Pic 4)-for the girl who loves to be a little dark
-Bermuda Blue (Pic 1)-for the girl who loves the sea
-Purple Rainbow (Pic 5)-for the girl who loves romance 

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

Nothing is more customizable than the various pendants of the Layered Sparkle™ line. After you've picked your chain and chain length, you can load up on different pendants and then coordinate them however you want. YOU are the designer when you start mixing the pendants together!

This is the listing for ONE *limited edition* snowflake-shaped pendant. For additional options or starter sets, see the "Interchangeable" section of the shop.

Each pendant features a large faceted snowflake-shaped pendant bead. This fun winter-inspired shape is perfect for your sweaters & boots (& holiday parties!). Add a Layered Sparkle Pendant and a Triple Drop Pendant, and you've got a modern and fun look!

Swarovski crystal pendant

name: Layered Sparkle Subscription - Pay-As-You-Go Option {Get a Pendant Delivered Each Month}
description:
Please note: discounts & free shipping codes are NOT valid on subscription options. Also, subscriptions only available in the U.S. right now. Sorry!

Do you have trouble narrowing down which pendants to purchase? Want to easily be able to mix your Layered Sparkle pendants? Well, this subscription option is for you!

With this subscription, you can have a fun Layered Sparkle pendant delivered each month. Over time, you'll grow your collection of interchangeable pendants, creating so many jewelry possibilities! And, with the Pay-As-You-Go option, you don't have to commit to a certain number of months--just keep it going until you have the collection you want!

*The FIRST MONTH includes your stainless steel chain + a Clear Leaf Pendant. Each month after that includes a pendant(s) worth $20 or more. On the 1st of each month, you will be invoiced $25 (includes shipping) for your month's package. To cancel your subscription, just reply back that you want to hold your subscription. A pre-paid option is also available (gives you a discount too). 

*AFTER YOU ORDER A SUBSCRIPTION, YOU WILL RECEIVE AN E-MAIL FROM MEGAN TO GET YOUR PREFERENCES. (chain length, favorite/least favorite colors, correct address of you or the recipient etc.)

*Chain Length Options (chosen when receive e-mail after ordering): 
16", 18", 20", 24", & 30".

*Orders placed before 12/31/13 will receive January's pendant as the second month's package. Orders placed after 1/1/14 will receive February's pendant as the second package.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Layered Sparkle Subscription - Pre-Paid Option {Get a Pendant Delivered Each Month}
description:
Please note: discounts & free shipping codes are NOT valid on subscription options. Also, subscriptions only available in the U.S. right now. Sorry!

***This makes an AMAZING Christmas or birthday gift, since your gift keeps giving month after month!***

Do you have trouble narrowing down which pendants to purchase? Want to easily be able to mix your Layered Sparkle pendants? Well, this subscription option is for you!

With this subscription, you can have a fun Layered Sparkle pendant delivered each month. Over the 3, 6, or 12 month period, you'll grow your collection of interchangeable pendants, creating so many jewelry possibilities!

*The FIRST MONTH includes your stainless steel chain + a Clear Leaf Pendant. Each month after that includes a pendant(s) worth $20 or more. By pre-paying, you'll pay as little as $15 (plus shipping) a month for your pendants. A Pay-As-You-Go option is also available. PLEASE NOTE: PRIORITY SHIPPING FOR THE SECOND MONTH ON IS INCLUDED IN THE PRICE OF THE SUBSCRIPTION.

*Subscription Options:
1. 3 Month Subscription: pay for first month + 2 months upfront, including shipping; pendants automatically delivered (save at least $5)
2. 6 Month Subscription: pay for first month + 5 months upfront, including shipping; pendants automatically delivered (save at least $21!)
3. 12 Month Subscription: pay for first month + 11 months upfront, including shipping; pendants automatically delivered (save at least $56!)

*AFTER YOU ORDER A SUBSCRIPTION, YOU WILL RECEIVE AN E-MAIL FROM MEGAN TO GET YOUR PREFERENCES. (chain length, favorite/least favorite colors, correct address of you or the recipient etc.)

*Chain Length Options (chosen when receive e-mail after ordering): 
16", 18", 20", 24", & 30".

*Orders placed before 12/31/13 will receive January's pendant as the second month's package. Orders placed after 1/1/14 will receive February's pendant as the second package.

***If you are giving this as a gift, you can choose the initial ship date to coincide with when you want to give the gift.***

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Game Day Hoop of Sparkle Earrings {Show Your Team Spirit} *Gold Option Available*
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle line.***

Want a fun pair of earrings to help you show team spirit for you favorite football team or your alma mater? These are light as air & perfect with your jerseys or school t-shirts!

These earrings feature a hoop made of small Swarovski beads and beading wire. These are fun and sweet and oh so easy to wear!

*Details: 
2 inches long 
Swarovski crystal beads 
Sterling Silver earwires

*Color Options: 
You can have a mix of 2 colors for your earrings. (See the color chart in picture 5.) WHEN CHECKING OUT, LEAVE YOUR TEAM/SCHOOL NAME OR TEAM COLORS IN THE PAYPAL MESSAGE BOX. If you leave the box blank, you will receive an e-mail after you order has been received. We are happy to help with color matching!

*A Gold-Filled Option is also available for $3 more (perfect for those with silver allergies!).

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

Ever wonder what a modern gypsy might wear in 2013? These earrings will entrance everyone who gets a look at you when you put these on. See a sophisticated future for yourself as you gaze into the clear quartz "crystalballs."

These earrings feature a 12mm clear quartz round bead and two accent 4mm Swarovski bicones, paired small cluster of 3 bicone beads dangling at the bottom. They are perfect for a holiday party, a night out with friends, or even just playing with the kids.

*Details:

Sterling Silver earwires 
Silver-Filled headpins & wire

For a night out, a wedding, or a fun day with friends, you sometimes want a pair of blingy, bold earrings. These sassy, modern earrings mix a simple design with a chunky burst of sparkle! With these, you'll feel like you're walking the red carpet since they are so glamorous.

description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

When you want a simple reminder of your family or the beauty of nature, this sweet necklace is a must! Customized with whatever color you want, it can be a lovely reminder of the important things in life.

This simple necklace features a "tree of life" pendant & 5 small beads hanging from the bottom of the pendant. This necklace is perfect for brides and bridesmaids at an outdoor wedding or just for everyday wear!

name: Interchangeable Sparkle Starter Chain {Start Your Collection Here}
description:
***This listing is for the stainless steel starter chain for the Interchangeable Sparkle™ line, no front cluster included.*** 

You know those days where you are running home from the office to change for dinner with friends? Normally, changing outfits requires changing all your accessories. With Interchangeable Sparkle™, that's not a problem. All you have to do is open the clasps on this Starter Chain and put on a new color combo.

Interchangeable front clusters (pictured with the starter chain) can be attached to the 2 clasps via the jumprings on the front clusters. No clasp in the back is needed!

*Details: 
Stainless Steel oval-link chain
Sterling Silver springring clasps
Silver-Filled jumprings

*Chain Length Options: 
16 inches (hits at nape of neck) 
18 inches
20 inches 
24 inches (hits at middle of chest) 
30 inches (hits below chest) 
*Each length is actually 2 inches shorter to accommodate the front cluster, so, for example, the 16 inch chain is actually 14 inches. 

*If you would like a special length not listed above, please e-mail before ordering and we will give you a price and ordering instructions.

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Swarovski Itsy Bitsy Earrings
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

You know that design that you love so much you want to own it in every color? These easy, playful earrings will become your give-me-all-the-colors earrings! Plus, they are so light, you won't even notice you have them on, making them great for work, chasing your kids around the park, or even dancing the night away at a wedding.

These earrings feature a small cluster of 3 beads dangling from sterling silver earwires. These earrings also work beautifully for brides or bridesmaids. Hello adorable and affordable bridesmaid gift!

*Details: 
1 inch long 
Swarovski crystal beads 
Sterling Silver headpins & earwires 

*Color Options: 
You have a choice of 36 Swarovski crystal colors; see picture 5 for the chart.

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Bold Sparkle Petal Berry Earrings
description:
***These earrings are part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

When you're wearing a strapless dress or top & some bright lipstick, you just need some big, bold earrings that are fun, yet sophisticated at the same time! These earrings are perfect for such a look.

These earrings feature an amazing cluster of White Opal and leaf-shaped bottom beads. The beads dangle from large marquise links. These are ideal for a night out with friends, since they are lightweight enough for dancing the night away!

*Details: 
2.5 inches long 
Swarovski crystal beads 
Sterling Silver earwires & headpins
Silver-Filled marquise links & wire

*Color Options: 
You have a choice of 10 Swarovski crystal colors (bottom leaf-shaped beads); see picture 5 for the chart.

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Layered Sparkle Starter Earrings
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

This is the listing for your first matched set of Layered Sparkle Pendants with interchangeable earwires. For additional pendants, see the "Interchangeable" section of the shop.

Each tiny cluster pendant features 7 small Swarovski crystal beads. They are available in your choice of Swarovski color and can be layered up to create your own unique look and/or color combo. These sterling silver earwires allow you to change your earrings as often as you like, for a low price! All other metal is sterling silver or silver-filled (sterling silver over brass.)

*Color Options: 
You have a choice of 40 Swarovski crystal colors; see picture 5 for the chart.

(This listing is for earwires + TWO PENDANTS. Additional pendants can be purchased separately.)

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Megan's Choice Petal Berry Earrings
description:
Sometimes, you just want the perfect pair of sparkly earrings by your ears. Megan found the most amazing, sparkly, fantastic Swarovski drops, and so she made this design!

These earrings feature a simple marquise-shape and oval drops. The real star of these are the purple rainbow color of these amazing Swarovski crystals. These are just the right mix of sparkle and metal for all-day wear! Wear them to a wedding, a night out, or to pick up your kids from school.

*Details: 
2 inches long 
Swarovski crystal drops
Sterling Silver links & earwires
Silver-Filled jumprings

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

Want a tiny look that can be layered with everything? Then this is the necklace for you!

This simple necklace features a tiny row of dangling Swarovski beads hanging from a delicate sterling silver cable-link chain. This necklace is perfect for brides and bridesmaids who want a petite accent of jewelry!

name: Shine On Earrings
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

Sometimes you just need some clear shine in your ears to make your eyes sparkle (even more than usual). Whether it's for a day of errands or for a glamorous party, the Shine On Earrings will always be perfect! They would even make a wonderful pair of earrings for your wedding day.

These earrings feature a fun cluster of faceted beads dangling from sterling silver oval-link chain. 

*Details: 
1.75 inches long

name: Row of Sparkle Bracelet
description:
***This design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

Want a sparkly, but easy layering bracelet? Then this is the one for you!

This bracelet features a row of 14 small bicone Swarovski crystals. The row of crystals connects to our signature oval-link chain. A spring-ring clasp finishes off the bracelet. All metal is sterling silver. It's a great look to layer up with other pieces in your wardrobe or just as a tiny accent. This is great to give friends or even bridesmaids!

*You have a choice of 1 or 2 colors of Swarovski crystals for your bracelet. The color chart is in picture 5. When checking out, leave the number(s) of the color choice(s) you want in the PayPal message box. If you leave the box blank, you will receive an e-mail after you order has been received.

*Additionally, you have the "rainbow" option, which is a multicolored look. (If you want a different mix of colors for your multicolored look, just pick the 1 color option and let me know after you receive the color chart e-mail.)

*This bracelet is 7 & 1/4 inches long. If you would like your bracelet closer to 8 inches, you can purchase the "Lengthen Your Bracelet" listing.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Geometric Sparkle Bracelet - Circle Option
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

Want a modern, sparkly bracelet? Then this one is for you!

This bracelet features a row of 5 mini circle Swarovski beads paired with small bicone Swarovski accents. The row of crystals connects to our signature oval-link chain. A spring-ring clasp finishes off the bracelet. All metal is sterling silver. It's a great look to layer up with other pieces in your wardrobe or just as a tiny accent. This is great to give friends or even bridesmaids!

*You have a choice of 14 colors for your circle beads: Clear AB (clear with a rainbow coating), Golden Shadow, Black Diamond (grey), Smoked Topaz (brown), Jet (black), Light Turquoise, Aquamarine, Montana Blue (dark teal), Fern Green, Emerald, Sunflower (yellow), Siam (red), Tanzanite (bluish purple), & Amethyst. Every bracelet is accented with clear bicone beads. 

*This bracelet is 7 & 1/4 inches long. If you would like your bracelet closer to 8 inches, you can purchase the "Lengthen Your Bracelet" listing.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Glass Charms {Set of 4}
description:
Want a fun way to keep everyone's wine glasses straight? These charms are perfect for that!

These charms feature a sweet little cluster of Swarovski crystal bicones with a silver-plated rings to attach them to your glasses. They are a beautiful hostess gift or a cute Bachelorette Party favor. Plus, these work for tea cups or other stemmed glasses, not just wine glasses.

*You have a choice of 2 different sets of Swarovski crystals colors for your glass charms. The Brights Set is shown in picture 1 & 2. The Jewel Tones Set is shown in picture 3. (If you choose the Custom Set, you will receive an e-mail to discuss colors after your order has been received. For your reference, the complete color chart is in picture 5.)

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Dinner at Downton Marquise Cluster Necklace
description:
***This listing is for the "Dinner at Downton" colorways, 7 color combos inspired by the hit show.***

This approximately 2 inch-long pendant features a cluster of Swarovski crystals. The cluster hangs in the middle of a large marquise shape. All metal is sterling silver. This lightweight design is sparkly and easy for all day wear!

*You have a choice of 7 colorways of Swarovski crystals for your necklace. Only 2 of the 3 colors of each combo is used in these design. See the colorway chart in picture 2 for explanation. Leave your colorway choice in the PayPal message box when checking out. (If you do not leave a note, you will receive an e-mail from me after your order has been received.)

*You have a choice of chain lengths: 
16 inch box chain (hits at nape of neck) 
16 inch oval chain 
18 inch box chain 
18 inch oval chain 
20 inch oval chain 
24 inch oval chain (hits at middle of chest) 
30 inch oval chain (hits below chest) 
36 inch oval chain (hits near belly button)

*Additionally, you can choose "No Chain" if you would like to use a chain you already own and save some money on the chain.

*To upgrade your necklace to a convertible enhancer or to purchase a middle cluster only (for interchangeable necklaces), see the "Necklace" category of the shop.

For full details about the inspiration for these colorways, read this blog post: http://flawedperfectionjewelry.com/dinner-at-downton/

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

*I do not own the rights to the "Downton Abbey" name. Each of these designs is simply inspired by the characters and/or activities of the show.

name: Itsy Bitsy Cluster Earrings
description:
Like your earrings tiny and lightweight? Want a style that your little girl can wear too? Then the Itsy Bitsy is the style for you!

These approximately 1/2 inch long earrings feature a small cluster of 3 freshwater pearls dangling from sterling silver earwires. These are a perfect everyday style! They would also be great for brides and bridesmaids--just a little pop at their ears on that special day!

*Your color choices are white, caribbean, cotton candy, sand, platinum, snowflake, spearmint, and midnight. 

*A Swarovski Crystal version is also available in the shop.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Rockin' Petal Berry Earrings
description:
These approximately 1 and 3/4 inch long earrings feature a simple sterling silver marquise-shaped jumpring and a hand-cut, high-quality faceted clear quartz nugget. These are a beautiful, simply sparkly pair of earring that would be amazing for a night out on the town. They also can make you feel like a rock star during the day ;)

*The matching Rockin' Cluster Necklace is also available in the shop!

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Essential Cluster Necklace
description:
This necklace features colorful 6mm white freshwater pearls dangling in a large cluster from oval-link sterling silver chain. All other metal is sterling silver as well. This necklace is ideal for your wedding day or everyday. It pairs well with almost anything and is a beautifully modern take on the standard pearl necklace. It will definitely become your new go-to necklace.

*You have a choice of 2 lengths: 
17 inches (fits more like 16 inches) 
19 inches (fits more like 18 inches)

***A Swarovski Crystal option is available for $30 more. If you choose this option, you will receive an e-mail after your order is placed so you can choose your color(s) from the 80 or so color options.

*These necklaces work great for brides and bridesmaids!

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Bubbly Bridal Bracelet
description:
This approximately 7 & 1/2 inch long bracelet features beautiful white freshwater pearls dangling from oval-link sterling silver chain. All other metal is sterling silver as well. This bracelet is such a simple, yet fun! The white is perfect for your special day, but works for everyday too.

***A Swarovski Crystal option is available for $20 more. If you choose this option, you will receive an e-mail after your order is placed so you can choose your color(s) from the 80 or so color options.

*If you would like your bracelet to be longer, you can purchase the "Lengthen Your Bracelet" item in the shop.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Dinner at Downton Barely There Necklace *Discontinued*
description:
***THIS DESIGN IS ON CLEARANCE. After it is sold out, it will not be back. If an option does not show up, it is already sold out.***

This necklace is a sweet and modern way to wear something inspired by Downton Abbey.

This approximately 3/4 inch-long pendant features a tiny cluster of Swarovski crystals accented by a 6mm round crystal. The cluster hangs from a simple sterling cable-link chain. All metal is sterling silver. This necklace is perfect for bridesmaids as well!

*You have a choice of 7 colorways of Swarovski crystals for your necklace. Leave your colorway choice in the PayPal message box when checking out. (If you do not leave a note, you will receive an e-mail from me after your order has been received.)

*You have a choice of chain lengths: 
16 inch cable chain (hits at nape of neck) 
18 inch cable chain

For full details about the inspiration for these colorways, read this blog post: http://flawedperfectionjewelry.com/dinner-at-downton/

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

*I do not own the rights to the "Downton Abbey" name. Each of these designs is simply inspired by the characters and/or activities of the show.

name: Rockstar Sparkle Earrings *Discontinued*
description:
***This Swarovski design is part of the Customized Sparkle™ line.***

Don’t you love the edgy, glamorous looks your favorite female rockers wear while they perform on stage? Usually they have some big, sparkly accessories on too, right? These bold and fun dangling earrings will make you feel like a classy rockstar!

These earrings feature small clusters paired with a single round bead on the very bottom of the long earrings.

*Details:
3.25 inches long
Swarovski crystal beads
Sterling Silver chain & earwires
Silver-Filled headpins

*Color Options:
-White Combo (pictured); mix of Clear, White Opal, and White Alabaster
-Custom Combo (+$5); you’ll receive an e-mail after ordering to discuss your combo of 3 colors (color chart can be seen in the last picture)

Usually ships within 1 week. Handmade in sunny San Diego.

This an original design of Flawed Perfection Jewelry™ by Megan Reynolds, A.J.P.

name: Lengthen Your Bracelet
description:
Add some extra length to your bracelet!

This listing is an add-on item to any of our Molecule Bracelets. A standard bracelet is 7 & 1/4 inches long. This will lengthen your bracelet by 3/4 inch, making it approximately 8 inches long.

If you would like a different length, or have any special instructions, please leave a note when checking out in PayPal.

name: Upgrade to Express Shipping {Rush Your Order}
description:
Purchase this listing if you would like to upgrade your shipping from Priority to Express Mail.

Your order will ship within 2 business days.

The price of this listing covers the difference in shipping, plus cost for the rush order.

***Not valid on custom orders. If you have any questions if your order can be rushed, just e-mail before ordering!***
